message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a product that is worth a significant amount to you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not sure it's worth that much to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $900000. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase, but I'm still very interested in acquiring the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to save some money, but I'm not willing to go that low. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. I'll offer you the product for $925000. This is a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.
